name: Nora Nightlight
description:
Use your blankie to avoid the monsters and activate all the light switches, lest ye be consumed by the nightmare.

**GAMEPAD RECOMMENDED**

Keyboard controls (if ye must):

  • Arrows = Movement
  • Left CTRL = Jump
  • Left Shift = Blankie whip
  • Left ALT = Hide under blankie
  • Space bar = Parachute

Created by:

Colby Breidenstein - Programming

Don Boody - Nora art, level design

Mark Miller - Enemy art, tiles, backgrounds, music, sound fx

Philip Lowrey - Music

Built in Unity in less than 48 hours for BGSJAM5.
